meanings.definition: The quality or state of being sociable or friendly in a club setting.
meanings.sent1: Her clubbability shone through as she greeted everyone with a warm smile at the book club meeting.
meanings.sent2: His clubbability made him a popular member of the chess club.
meanings.sent3: The penguin's clubbability was evident as it waddled over to join the other penguins in the club.
meanings.sent4: The sunflower's clubbability was so strong that it stood out among the other flowers in the garden.
meanings.sent5: The puppy's clubbability was infectious, bringing joy to all the members of the dog club.

meanings.definition: The ability to easily form or join clubs or social groups.
meanings.sent1: His clubbability allowed him to effortlessly become part of the hiking club.
meanings.sent2: She had such great clubbability that she was invited to join multiple clubs in school.
meanings.sent3: The robot's clubbability was impressive as it seamlessly integrated into the robotics club.
meanings.sent4: The key's clubbability to fit into any lock made it the most sought-after key in the club.
meanings.sent5: The chameleon's clubbability to adapt to different environments made it a perfect member of the nature club.
